DocumentReference.Name: DocumentReference
DocumentReference.Description: An instance of the R4 DocumentReference resource.

author.Name: author
author.Description: Who or what created the order.

url.Name: url
url.Description: Binary link for the textual content.

encounter.Name: encounter
encounter.Description: Encounter that order is linked to.

period.Name: period
period.Description: The time of the order being documented.

custodian.Name: custodian
custodian.Description: The name of the organization where the order was created.

date.Name: date
date.Description: The instant when this order was created.

identifier.Name: identifier
identifier.Description: The order identifier from the Epic system.

status.Name: status
status.Description: The status of the lab result. Always "current".

subject.Name: subject
subject.Description: Patient that is linked to the order.

type.Name: type
type.Description:
Returns one of the following LOINC codes:
  • 18748-4 Imaging Narrative Note
  • 11526-1 Pathology Narrative Note
  • 11502-2 Laboratory Narrative Note
  • 34109-9 Note
